content: decorate your home for fall with three different sizes of double twist pumpkins this advanced beginner pattern utilizes the texture of twisted single crochets to create the pumpkin sections the pattern features three sizes and two video tutorials small and medium/large size it s available for free on my blog or as an ad-free pdf on ravelry **materials ** ~25-90 yards of brava worsted or your favorite worsted weight yarn h 5 0 mm crochet hook stem i used 1 5 inch sticks stuffing tapestry needle scissors if you make some pumpkins please share them with me on instagram use hashtags #doubletwistpumpkin and #youshouldcraft to be featured on the you should craft feed or stories disclaimer you are welcome to sell items made using these patterns using your own images not mine but please provide credit and a link back to youshouldcraft com or my ravelry designer page permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing
